","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at93o","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":10,"offset":139}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"afaqh","text":"If a fraction of the target protein is insoluble, repeat expression at a lower temperature (15 to 30°C) or test expression in Lemo21(DE3) (NEB #C2528).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"url":"https://www.neb.com/products/c2528-lemo21de3-competent-e-coli"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}}}}
